DOC.brief_summary: Evaluating safety efficacy use topical retinoid photodynamic therapy treatment actinic keratoses .
DOC.brief_title: Photo-therapy With Topical Retinoid Versus Photo-therapy Alone Actinic Keratoses
DOC.detailed_description: Evaluating safety efficacy use topical retinoid photodynamic therapy v photodynamic therapy alone treatment actinic keratoses .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Adults age 1880 year old Subjects AK lesion receive PDT Subjects AK lesion two area face scalp surface area 10cm2 great least 3 clinically diagnosed nonhypertrophic AK lesion Subjects good health Subjects willingness ability understand provide inform consent Exclusion Criteria Subjects pregnant lactating Subjects history cutaneous photosensitivity porphyria , hypersensitivity porphyrin , photodermatosis Subjects use photosensitize drug within 1 week study start Subjects use topical medication corticosteroid , alphahydroxyacids retinoids 2 week study entry Subjects receive previous treatment target AKs within 4 week Subjects unable understand protocol give inform consent
